post.body: - SPOILER ALERT! I'm still watching season 2.
- You are good man. elclinto is classic. It also makes my fingers happy when I type it.
- I'm slightly jealous of your two character, same letter username. It's lighter than air!
- How many AA tees do you have in rotation? Right now I have 3.
- I go to church at Gateway (gatewaypeople.com).
The Jones family Wii is a success. Currently watching dad shake the maracas (aka Wiimotes) to "Papa Loves Mambo".
You know times are changing when you give your mom a video game for Christmas (Samba De Amigo for Wii)
Finished watching home video footage of Christmas 1993. Good memories. Man, I was one mean, obnoxious kid.
Having some chocolate covered biscuit sticks. http://twitpic.com/w556
Eating at Applebees with the fam. Last time here was 5 years ago when I was interviewing at Neubix with @stillframe and @simmy
Merry Christmas http://twitpic.com/vrgy
Driving home to Missouri. First music choice of the day: Carolina Liars
Changed my Twitter username from hikeegan to keeg. Less characters = mo' betta.
Drinking some preemptive AIRBORNE before the @hype01 event tonight. Unsure that it prevents sickness, but it's worth a shot.
If possible, I'd wear a grey American Apparel 50/25/25 t-shirt everyday for the rest of my life.
There is a 25-50% chance of a white Christmas in Springfield, Missouri.
Welker just got a penalty for making a snow angel after a TD in the New England game. HAHA.
First time going to church on Sunday morning (instead of Saturday night) in a while. Looking forward to hearing @prestonmorrison preach it.
is video chatting to the other side of the world via Skype.
Today: Breakfast at Coppell Deli, Drive to Dallas, Ski Shop, Drive home, Wrong sized pants, Drive to Dallas, Ski Shop exchange, Drive home.
